meanings.definition: relating to the science or practice of travel through the air
meanings.sent1: The aeronautical engineer designed a new type of airplane wing.
meanings.sent2: She studied aeronautical principles to understand how planes fly.
meanings.sent3: The aeronautical expert joked that birds were the original aeronautical engineers.
meanings.sent4: His dreams soared with aeronautical possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The aeronautical conference showcased the latest advancements in aviation technology.

meanings.definition: of or relating to aircraft or aviation
meanings.sent1: The aeronautical industry plays a crucial role in global transportation.
meanings.sent2: Pilots undergo extensive training in aeronautical safety procedures.
meanings.sent3: The aeronautical enthusiast proudly displayed his model airplane collection.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for aeronautical history was evident in her detailed aircraft replicas.
meanings.sent5: The aeronautical museum featured a wide range of vintage aircraft.
